parameter.name: logDate
parameter.description: Date on which the user spent on the task.

parameter.name: logTime
parameter.description: Time the user spent on this task. Either send this attribute or begin and end time attributes.

parameter.name: beginTime
parameter.description: Time the user started working on this task.

parameter.name: endTime
parameter.description: Time the user stopped working on this task.

parameter.name: isBillable
parameter.description: Whether it is billable or not.
